titleStmt.title: Papers relating to a bank of credit upon land security proposed to the Parliament of Scotland / by Dr. Hugh Chamberlen.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Hugh, fl. 1720.
Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Published by order of the committee to which the consideration of the proposal is referred."
Imperfect: stained, defaced, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angles.
